summary.span: 代表 控制項在執行階段中繪製的資料表。

span.span: Represents the table drawn by the control at run time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項會顯示在方格的表單中的資料。The control displays data in the form of a grid. 是類別，表示繪製的格線。The is a class that represents the drawn grid only. 此方格不應該與混淆類別，這是資料方格的可能來源。This grid should not be confused with the class, which is a possible source of data for the grid. 相反地，嚴格表示繪製控制項中的方格。Instead, the strictly represents the grid as it is painted in the control. 因此，透過您可以控制每個格線的外觀。Therefore, through the you can control the appearance of the grid for each . 若要指定的用來顯示從特定的資料，將要的。To specify which is used when displaying data from a particular , set the to the of a . 透過擷取屬性包含全部所使用的物件控制項。The retrieved through the property contains all the objects used by a control. 集合可以包含多個物件視需要不過每個必須是唯一的。The collection can contain as many objects as you need, however the of each must be unique. 在執行階段，這可讓您以不同為相同的資料，根據使用者的喜好設定。At run time, this allows you to substitute a different for the same data, depending on the user's preference. 若要這樣做：To do this: 1. 填入與物件。Populate the with objects. 如果存在於其屬性值等於物件的屬性顯示與這個。If a exists in the whose property value equals the object's property, the is displayed with this . 如果沒有有相符，則就會顯示資料方格資料表的預設樣式。If no exists with a matching , the is displayed with the default style for data grid tables. 2. 當需要不同的格線樣式時，使用`Item`屬性，以選取適當(傳遞來屬性) 並設定傳回的物件，為新值。When a different grid style is needed, use the `Item` property to select the appropriate (pass the to the property) and set the of the returned object to a new value. 3. 使用屬性，以選取所需，並將其要的。Use the property to select the desired , and set its to the of the . > [!CAUTION] > 一律會建立物件，並將其新增至之前新增物件至。Always create objects and add them to the before adding objects to the . 當您將加入空的有效值加入集合中，自動為您產生的物件。When you add an empty with a valid value to the collection, objects are automatically generated for you. 因此，將會擲回例外狀況如果您嘗試加入新物件具有重複值來。Consequently, an exception will be thrown if you try to add new objects with duplicate values to the . 若要判斷哪些是目前顯示，請使用和的屬性傳回。To determine which is currently displayed, use the and properties of the to return a . 如果資料來源會實作介面，您可以使用方法來傳回目前資料表。If the data source implements the interface, you can use the method to return the of the current table. 下列 C# 程式碼所示：This is shown in the C# code below: ``` private void PrintCurrentListName(DataGrid myDataGrid){ CurrencyManager myCM = (CurrencyManager) BindingContext[myDataGrid.DataSource, myDataGrid.DataMember]; IList myList = myCM.List; ITypedList thisList = (ITypedList) myList; Console.WriteLine(thisList.GetListName(null)); } ``` 如果包含透過相關聯的物件物件，以及目前顯示是子資料表中，會傳回字串形式的 TableName.RelationName （在簡單的情況下）。If the contains objects related through objects, and the currently displayed is a child table, the will return a string in the form of TableName.RelationName (in the simplest case). 如果會進一步減少在階層中，字串將會包含父資料表的名稱，後面接著必要才能連線到資料表層級的值。If the is further down in the hierarchy, the string will consist of the parent table's name followed by the necessary values required to reach the table's level. 例如，假設有三個名為階層式的關係 （往下） 中的物件`Regions`， `Customers`，和`Orders`，並將兩個物件命名`RegionsToCustomers`和`CustomersToOrders`， 屬性會傳回"Regions.RegionsToCustomers.CustomersToOrders 」。For example, imagine three objects in a hierarchical relationship named (top to bottom) `Regions`, `Customers`, and `Orders`, and two objects named `RegionsToCustomers` and `CustomersToOrders`, the property will return "Regions.RegionsToCustomers.CustomersToOrders". 不過，則是 「 訂單 」。However, the will then be "Orders". 集合經由傳回的物件屬性。The collection of objects is returned through the property of the . 當出現時，設定將會覆寫的設定控制項。When a is displayed, the settings for the will override the settings for the control. 如果值未設定為特定屬性，控制項的值將改為使用。If a value is not set for a particular property, the control's value will be used instead. 下列清單顯示可以設定覆寫屬性控制屬性：The following list shows the properties that can be set to override control properties: - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 若要繫結到物件的強型別陣列中的物件型別必須包含公用屬性。To bind the to a strongly typed array of objects, the object type must contain public properties. 若要建立會顯示陣列，設定屬性設`typename`其中`typename`以物件類型的名稱取代。To create a that displays the array, set the property to `typename` where `typename` is replaced by the name of the object type. 也請注意，屬性會區分大小寫; 必須完全符合的型別名稱。Also note that the property is case-sensitive; the type name must be matched exactly. 請參閱範例中的屬性。See the property for an example. 您也可以繫結至。You can also bind the to an . 一項功能是，它可以包含物件的多個類型，但只能繫結至這類清單在清單中的所有項目時的第一個項目相同的型別。A feature of the is that it can contain objects of multiple types, but the can only bind to such a list when all items in the list are of the same type as the first item. 這表示，所有的物件必須是相同的類型，或它們必須繼承自清單中的第一個項目相同的類別。This means that all objects must either be of the same type, or they must inherit from the same class as the first item in the list. 例如，如果在清單中的第一個項目，第二個項目可能(繼承自)。For example, if the first item in a list is a , the second item could be a (which inherits from ). 如果，相反地，第一個項目是，第二個物件不可以是。If, on the other hand, the first item is a , the second object cannot be a . 此外，繫結和中的物件時，必須具有項目在它必須包含公用屬性。Further, the must have items in it when it is bound and the objects in the must contain public properties. 空白會導致空的方格。An empty will result in an empty grid. 當繫結至，將的於"ArrayList"（類型名稱）。When binding to an , set the of the to "ArrayList" (the type name). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立兩個執行個體，並設定每個物件的在。The following code example creates two instances and sets the of each object to the of a in a . 範例接著會新增物件至每個。The example then adds objects to the of each . 如需執行的範例，請參閱範例。For an example that runs, see the example. remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要繫結到物件的強型別陣列中的物件型別必須包含公用屬性。To bind the to a strongly typed array of objects, the object type must contain public properties. 若要建立會顯示陣列，設定屬性設`typename`其中`typename`以物件類型的名稱取代。To create a that displays the array, set the property to `typename` where `typename` is replaced by the name of the object type. 也請注意，屬性會區分大小寫; 必須完全符合的型別名稱。Also note that the property is case-sensitive; the type name must be matched exactly. 請參閱範例中的屬性。See the property for an example. 您也可以繫結至。You can also bind the to an . 一項功能是，它可以包含物件的多個類型，但只能繫結至這類清單在清單中的所有項目時的第一個項目相同的型別。A feature of the is that it can contain objects of multiple types, but the can only bind to such a list when all items in the list are of the same type as the first item. 這表示，所有的物件必須是相同的類型，或它們必須繼承自清單中的第一個項目相同的類別。This means that all objects must either be of the same type, or they must inherit from the same class as the first item in the list. 例如，如果在清單中的第一個項目，第二個項目可能(繼承自)。For example, if the first item in a list is a , the second item could be a (which inherits from ). 如果，相反地，第一個項目是，第二個物件不可以是。If, on the other hand, the first item is a , the second object cannot be a . 此外，它繫結時，必須有項目中。Further, the must have items in it when it is bound. 空白會導致空的方格。An empty will result in an empty grid. 當繫結至，將的於"ArrayList"（類型名稱）。When binding to an , set the of the to "ArrayList" (the type name). 預設值是由清單的名稱此格線。The default is the name of the list managed by the for this grid. For會設定使用建構函式。The for the is set using the constructor. 就會發生事件時值變更。The event occurs when the value changes. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立的陣列`Widget`物件，並會繫結控制項陣列。The following code example creates an array of `Widget` objects and binds a control to the array. 程式碼接著會建立，並設定類別加上括號的名稱。The code then creates a and sets the to the name of the class plus brackets. [!code-cpp[DataGridTable.MappingName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DataGridTable.MappingName Example/CPP/bindarray.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[DataGridTable.MappingName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DataGridTable.MappingName Example/CS/bindarray.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataGridTable.MappingName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DataGridTable.MappingName Example/VB/bindarray.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 慣用的高度是以容納所顯示的文字，與指派所需的最小高度。The preferred height is the minimum height needed to accommodate the displayed text with the assigned . 使用指定的值大於或等於高度，將不會建立一個資料列。A row will not be created with a height less than the specified value. 如果字型大小會需要它，不過，資料列高度，可能會大於指定的值。If the font size requires it, however, the row height may be greater than the specified value. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
